attributes.additional_details:
What is the point of leaving the EU "to save the UK." if we only to end up lossing scotland and therefore losing the UK as it is today ..

Nicola Sturgeon says second Scottish independence vote 'highly likely' http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-scotland-politics-36621030
 NEARLY six in 10 Scots have said they would vote Yes in a second independence referendum.
https://www.sundaypost.com/news/political-news/end-uk-new-survey-shows-59-support-scottish-independence-brexit-vote/
attributes.background: Scotland is likely to seek independence from the UK. If Scotland now wants to vote and leave the UK then it is clear, we need to have a new referendum on Brexit. The very survival of the UK is in danger. If Scotland leaves the UK this will be the end of the UK. and that is not what we voted for !
